text: A total of 8 patients did not preserve fertility and among the remaining 65 patients $( 8 9 \% )$ who preserved fertility after NACT, 20 pregnancies were reported $( 3 0 .7 \% ) ,$ with 16 deliveries (6 preterm and 10 at term), 2 ongoing pregnancies, 1 ectopic pregnancy, and 3 miscarriages (some women delivered more than one baby).
